endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: protect

param_schema.title: Protect
param_schema.description: Control how much of the original vocals' breath and voiceless consonants to leave in the AI vocals. Set 0.5 to disable.

parameters.description: Control how much of the original vocals' breath and voiceless consonants to leave in the AI vocals. Set 0.5 to disable.

parameters.name: f0_method

param_schema.description: Pitch detection algorithm. 'rmvpe' for clarity in vocals, 'mangio-crepe' for smoother vocals.

parameters.description: Pitch detection algorithm. 'rmvpe' for clarity in vocals, 'mangio-crepe' for smoother vocals.

parameters.name: rvc_model

param_schema.description: RVC model for a specific voice. If using a custom model, this should match the name of the downloaded model. If a 'custom_rvc_model_download_url' is provided, this will be automatically set to the name of the downloaded model.

parameters.description: RVC model for a specific voice. If using a custom model, this should match the name of the downloaded model. If a 'custom_rvc_model_download_url' is provided, this will be automatically set to the name of the downloaded model.

parameters.name: index_rate

param_schema.title: Index Rate
param_schema.description: Control how much of the AI's accent to leave in the vocals.

parameters.description: Control how much of the AI's accent to leave in the vocals.

parameters.name: pitch_change

param_schema.title: Pitch Change
param_schema.description: Adjust pitch of AI vocals in semitones. Use positive values to increase pitch, negative to decrease.

parameters.description: Adjust pitch of AI vocals in semitones. Use positive values to increase pitch, negative to decrease.

parameters.name: rms_mix_rate

param_schema.title: Rms Mix Rate
param_schema.description: Control how much to use the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1).

parameters.description: Control how much to use the original vocal's loudness (0) or a fixed loudness (1).

parameters.name: filter_radius

param_schema.title: Filter Radius
param_schema.description: If >=3: apply median filtering to the harvested pitch results.

parameters.description: If >=3: apply median filtering to the harvested pitch results.

parameters.name: output_format

param_schema.description: wav for best quality and large file size, mp3 for decent quality and small file size.

parameters.description: wav for best quality and large file size, mp3 for decent quality and small file size.

parameters.name: crepe_hop_length

param_schema.title: Crepe Hop Length
param_schema.description: When `f0_method` is set to `mangio-crepe`, this controls how often it checks for pitch changes in milliseconds.

parameters.description: When `f0_method` is set to `mangio-crepe`, this controls how often it checks for pitch changes in milliseconds.

parameters.name: custom_rvc_model_download_url

param_schema.title: Custom Rvc Model Download Url
param_schema.description: URL to download a custom RVC model. If provided, the model will be downloaded (if it doesn't already exist) and used for prediction, regardless of the 'rvc_model' value.

parameters.description: URL to download a custom RVC model. If provided, the model will be downloaded (if it doesn't already exist) and used for prediction, regardless of the 'rvc_model' value.
